scripts.docs:instruments: npx typedoc src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/Synth.ts src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/Sampler2.ts src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/Granular2.ts src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/AcidSynth.ts src/oto/ct-synths/tone/Synth.ts src/oto/ct-synths/tone/AMSynth.ts src/oto/ct-synths/tone/FMSynth.ts src/oto/ct-synths/tone/MonoSynth.ts --json src/docs/instruments.json
scripts.docs:fx: npx typedoc src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/Delay.ts src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/ReverbGen.ts src/oto/ct-synths/rnbo/FXChannel.ts --json src/docs/fx.json
